page.title: 04Cupar Housing
page.content: The Age of Houses in Cupar _{Housing} in Cupar can be classified into three sections :- 1.Houses built before 1850 (mostly near the town centre, placed in and around the C.B.D.). 2.Houses built between 1850 and the Second World War 1939. 3.Houses built since 1945 (includes the new{housing}estates){ { Housing}in the C.B.D. consists mostly of flats (above shops) and terraced buildings.The buildings around the C.B.D. are mainly from Victorian and Edwardian times.On the edge of Cupar lie the post-war developments; both private and{council housing}estates. In the{council estates}the houses range from semi-detatched or prefabs from the 1940's to the more modern estates with four storey house blocks from the 1960's and 1970's.
